thread.title: Metric Insights to Sponsor Tableau Conference 2015
thread.title_full: Metric Insights to Sponsor Tableau Conference 2015

author: admin
title: Metric Insights to Sponsor Tableau Conference 2015
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/15/2015 @ 7:47 AM   Metric Insights 
SAN FRANCISCO -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Metric Insights , the BI company delivering Push Intelligence for data-driven organizations, today announced it is a Gigabyte Sponsor of the Tableau Conference 2015 (TC15), October 19-23, 2015 in Las Vegas. TC15 is the place to build relationships with data — and with each other — for a clearer understanding of the world, and how to change it for the better. The conference agenda features more than 340 sessions, including hands-on training labs, thought-provoking keynote speakers, plus Tableau Doctor and Community. 
“Participating in TC15 provides us an opportunity to connect with like-minded organizations that are hyper-focused on data and how to best leverage it for business success,” said Marius Moscovici, founder and CEO of Metric Insights. “Sponsoring and having a presence at TC15 will allow us to strengthen relationships with our customers, partners and get exposure to the newest innovations and industry trends.” 
In addition to its sponsorship, Metric Insights will be exhibiting and demoing its Push Intelligence platform for Tableau at booth #441. The company’s Push Intelligence platform lets customers know when their key business metrics change and why. The company accomplishes this by connecting a KPI Warehouse to metrics from Business Intelligence (BI), SaaS, Big Data and other data visualization tools. Specifically for Tableau, Metric Insights Push Intelligence enables anomaly detection, data-driven alerting, email report bursting and user collaboration, driving users to engage with the most relevant Tableau dashboard when significant events occur that they need to take action on. 
For more information on TC15 visit http://tc15.tableau.com/ . For more information on Metric Insights visit www.metricinsights.com . 
About Metric Insights 
Metric Insights bridges the last mile to Business Intelligence and Big Data. Metric Insights lets your users cut through the noise, focus immediately on the critical business issues that warrant their attention, and take action. Our Push Intelligence Platform connects quickly and easily to your existing business intelligence tools, big data and SaaS applications. Metric Insights uniquely delivers a patented KPI warehouse, collaboration and notification technologies that tell you when your key business metrics have changed, and, more importantly, why. To learn more, visit www.metricinsights.com . View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20151015006113/en/ Copyright © Business Wire 2015
